title: Hybrid Language Education Model Design: Systematic Instructional Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules and customized interactions are required for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can establish self-directed language learning plans utilizing an LMS in a hybrid environment
Learners can perform effective interactions with peers and instructors through online discussions and feedback activities

Over a 6-month course, learners improve their language proficiency from CEFR A2 to B1 through interaction with digital content (10 videos, 20 quiz items, 5 reading materials). Specific objectives include: 1) engaging with content at least 3 times weekly, 2) achieving CEFR B1 level in an official assessment at course completion, 3) scoring an average of 75% or higher on quizzes, and 4) delivering a 3-minute presentation based on reading materials.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
